name: Kraehe
description:
Do you remember?

Klaus Holstein, better known by his stage name Bartram, is retiring at the peak of his career in silent film. What should have been an easygoing party turns into the nightmare of his life, courtesy of an old friend. How the night ends, is entirely up to you.

---

Kraehe is a short visual novel with multiple endings and a dark story. Made for the SCREAM SOLSTICE jam.

--

Credits
  • Art, story, programming - Red Lily
  • Main theme - TheWalker
  • Additional SFX - Freesound.org
  • Additional music - Free Music Archive, MIT Concert Choir, *CAMeLIA*
  • Made with Naninovel by Elringus
